HDG.FS.content: Heidegger tells us to understand “need of philosophy” as genitivus subjectivus [limiting double genitive], what philosophy needs to be authentic philosophy
HDG.FS.linkedContent: Heidegger tells us to understand “need of philosophy” as genitivus subjectivus [limiting double genitive], what philosophy needs to be authentic philosophy

HDG.FS.content: twofold seeing: two visions: sensuous vision & categorial vision > difficulty in double signification of seeing (one that already governs Plato’s philosophy)
HDG.FS.linkedContent: twofold seeing: two visions: sensuous vision & categorial vision > difficulty in double signification of seeing (one that already governs Plato’s philosophy)

HDG.DL.content: [re: “Expression and Meaning (Ausdruck und Bedeutung [double takes on Erscheinung]”] I was concerned to make visible (sichtbar machen) das ganz Andere [the totally other], which [at that time], I had only an obscure (dunkel) or confused intimation (verworren Geahnte) [Derrida beyond Heidegger: can’t make totally other visible]
